start.text: I will give this task all the love it deserves.
Time to get this party started!

start_boss.text: Look at the size of it! Oh my...

retreat.text: This is nothing like I expected it to be!

engaged.text: This won't hurt a bit. Well, it won't hurt me anyway.
Oh, I know how to handle creeps who want to get too close.

need_help.text: This is not a fun position to be in right now!

pursuing.text: I could do this blindfolded and tied up!
You just like watching me walk.

running.text: This is too hard for me, and that's not something I say very often.
We are getting a lot of attention. And not of the fun and flirty kind.

hull_90.text: I've had back rubs worse than that...
Kinky! But I don't like it.

hull_50.text: This is not looking very good...
Nothing in my life ever works out!
That better not leave a scar!

hull_30.text: I don't think I'm gonna make it...
I have a whole career ahead of me. I can't die now.

overload.text: What's a girl have to do to get something that works around here?
Uh-oh. I think this thing is falling apart. Do we have a handyman who can check out my equipment?

death.text: Tell my agent... release the nudes...

victory.text: Yeah, we did 'em all! I love that!
Hey, we did 'em all! Makes me feel satisfied and kind of tingly.
Now, that's how a lady gets things done!
